item.description:
Join us for a 3 hour cruise of the Tall Ships with music of the Bellevue Cadillac band.

I was just informed that the cruise company has just moved boarding time to 8:30!!!

The REVISED time schedule is:

Look for me holding a helium balloon of some sort.
(How many people could there possibly be holding a helium balloon)?

5:30 pm - (optional)
Meet at Tia's on the side of the Long Wharf Marriott.

8:00 pm -
Gather at the Landing Bar near the boats, in front of the Long Wharf Marriott.

8:30 PM -
Board the Frederic L Nolan for the cruise

PLEASE BE PROMPT! You don't want to miss the boat!


This is a great price for a Tall Ships cruise that includes great music, dancing and lots of fun!

This cruise is just about sold out.
Reserve now!

Before setting sail, join your fellow Rock and Blues Cruise
mates at The Landing for a Bon Voyage Pre-Party beginning at 5:30pm.
The Landing is conveniently located at Long Warf
just a few feet away from your ship.

The ship boards at 7:00 pm and sails at 7:30 pm.
PLEASE BE PROMPT!

Boston Harbor Cruises
Aboard the Frederick L. Nolan Jr.
One Long Wharf
(adjacent to the Marriott Hotel and across from the New England Aquarium)
Boston

group.name: 40/50 Something Year Olds - Men & Women Social Networking

item.name: Rock and Blues Concert Cruise Tall Ships Party
